description:
Nicholas has done video work before, so I was pleased when I got an email saying he was looking to do some videos with ChaosMen.
He identifies as straight, and seems to have a thing for fit blondes. He loves women's asses and I think he has put that to good use doing gay porn.
Nicholas was very comfortable in front of the camera. He gets his cock hard quickly by tugging on it. He seems to love to squeeze all the blood to the tip of his head, making it all engorged and dripping with precum.
His cum shot is awesome too!
I had him setup to do an oral video the next day, but things got out of hand, so stay-tuned next week to see him in full-action!
title: Nicholas Duff - Solo
